trans-unit.source: Restore Data from the Agent Interface

seg-source.mrk: Restore Data from the Agent Interface

target.mrk: Restaurer des données à partir de l'interface de l'agent

trans-unit.source: The <MadCap:variable name="General.ProductName" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" /> agent interface allows you to restore any protected version of a file or folder backed up on the <MadCap:variable name="General.ProductName" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" /> server. This can be useful when an object has been corrupted, lost or accidentally overwritten.

seg-source.mrk: The <MadCap:variable name="General.ProductName" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" /> agent interface allows you to restore any protected version of a file or folder backed up on the <MadCap:variable name="General.ProductName" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" /> server.
This can be useful when an object has been corrupted, lost or accidentally overwritten.

target.mrk: L'interface de l'agent <MadCap:variable name="General.ProductName" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" /> vous permet de restaurer n'importe quelle version protégée d'un fichier ou d'un dossier sauvegardé sur le serveur <MadCap:variable name="General.ProductName" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" />.
Cela peut être utile lorsqu'un objet a été corrompu, perdu ou écrasé accidentellement.

trans-unit.source: To perform a restore, you need to make sure that the agent onto which you want to restore data is connected to the <MadCap:variable name="General.ProductName" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" /> server through a network.

seg-source.mrk: To perform a restore, you need to make sure that the agent onto which you want to restore data is connected to the <MadCap:variable name="General.ProductName" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" /> server through a network.

target.mrk: Pour effectuer une restauration, vous devez vous assurer que l'agent sur lequel vous souhaitez restaurer les données est connecté au serveur <MadCap:variable name="General.ProductName" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" /> via un réseau.

trans-unit.source: In addition to restoring your data on your own local machine, <MadCap:variable name="General.ProductName" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd"></MadCap:variable> enables you to perform the following types of advanced restore:

seg-source.mrk: In addition to restoring your data on your own local machine, <MadCap:variable name="General.ProductName" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd"></MadCap:variable> enables you to perform the following types of advanced restore:

target.mrk: En plus de restaurer vos données sur votre propre machine locale, <MadCap:variable name="General.ProductName" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd"></MadCap:variable> vous permet d'effectuer les types de restauration avancée suivants :

trans-unit.source: : Restore data to a computer other than the one where data was backed up.

seg-source.mrk: : Restore data to a computer other than the one where data was backed up.

target.mrk: : Restaure les données sur un ordinateur autre que celui où les données ont été sauvegardées.

trans-unit.source: : Launch the restore from a computer other than the one where data was backed up.

seg-source.mrk: : Launch the restore from a computer other than the one where data was backed up.

target.mrk: : Lance la restauration à partir d'un ordinateur autre que celui sur lequel les données ont été sauvegardées.

trans-unit.source: : Restore data backed up by a server other than the one backing up your agent.

seg-source.mrk: : Restore data backed up by a server other than the one backing up your agent.

target.mrk: : Restaure les données sauvegardées par un serveur autre que celui qui sauvegarde votre agent.

trans-unit.source: : Perform a cross-restore on a remote machine of data stored on a replicated server.

seg-source.mrk: : Perform a cross-restore on a remote machine of data stored on a replicated server.

target.mrk: : Effectue une restauration croisée des données stockées sur un serveur répliqué vers une machine distante.
